title: Political effect of Great Depression on economy

content.question: Which of the following was the major long-term political effect of the Great Depression?

choices.label: Governments began to take a more active role in economic life.
Labor unions in industrialized states dominated political life.
Philanthropic organizations provided relief for disadvantaged children
Governments created policies to restrict international trade.

content.answer: Governments began to take a more active role in economic life.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
